meanings.definition: Talkative to an excessive or annoying degree.
meanings.sent1: She is overtalkative during class, always disrupting the lesson with her constant chatter.
meanings.sent2: The overtalkative student couldn't stop talking even when the teacher asked for silence.
meanings.sent3: The overtalkative parrot in the pet store entertained customers with its non-stop squawking.
meanings.sent4: Her overtalkative nature was like a never-ending stream of words flowing out of her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The overtalkative toddler at the party made everyone smile with his endless stories.

meanings.sent1: The overtalkative at the meeting dominated the conversation, not letting anyone else speak.
meanings.sent2: Being an overtalkative can sometimes make it hard to listen to others.
meanings.sent3: The overtalkative at the party shared so many stories that everyone was entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her friend was an overtalkative, always filling the silence with her words.
meanings.sent5: The overtalkative in the group made sure no one else had a chance to speak.
